title: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry cannot be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource
description: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry cannot be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource. Therefore, all the resources that are being looked up are only relative to the location of the FontRegistry class in the org.eclipse.jface.resource path. It can be remedied if FontRegistry took a client class (or class loader) as an additional parameter to the constructor.
OB: The FontRegistry class currently cannot be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource.
EB: The FontRegistry class should allow clients to load their own resource bundle and take it as a parameter to the constructor (instead of the name of the bundle).
SR: To reproduce the issue, try to instantiate the FontRegistry class using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource. The class will not be able to find the required resources.
